turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza from a new place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you please repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For one of the pizzas, I want pepperoni and beef.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and the others?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second one, I want bacon and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and the third?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the third one, I want a meat lover.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what kind of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all of them to be thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: meatlovers is only available on thick crust. is that ok or would you like to change your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to change that one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to be a vegan and chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. how would you like to substitute?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: bacon and chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, so a bacon and chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special request?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 small pizzas. 1 pepperoni and beef, the second with bacon and extra cheese, the third is bacon and chicken. all of them are thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I wanted all of them to be large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh ok. so 3 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. your total is $48.76.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!
